entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow pinning Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref version #42199
  • Make RuntimeFrameworkVersion apply to targeting packs #42196
    10.0.1xx
  • Publish all .dll dependencies to a separate /lib or /bin directory (dotnet publish) #42191
  • Project source of warnings not immediately obvious when building a solution #42190
  • NET SDK tool install repetition fails if folder was copied via Docker on Windows #42182
  • For Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk projects it should be possible to configure packages installs to use npm ci rather than npm install #42171
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 p7 zip installed, the prompt message "update are available for the..." should not be displayed after installing wasm-tools. #42170

Closed

  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.200] dotnet tool install command get access deny message #38354
  • dotnet tool restore results in FileNotFoundException on linux due to case sensitivity issue #41844
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9 preview 7 sdk installed, Running winforms/wpf failed in CLI. #42012

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete trn, not tmp, in cleaning up #42201
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support to generate SBRP usage report #42200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard Installer EndToEnd tests to Helix #42195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix RestoreCommand filename #42175
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automated test to verify that the custom culture is respected #42174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix scoped CSS hot reload #42137
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Make dotnet help understand subcommands #42161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix CodeOwners file #42127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update scancode to 32.2.1 #42079
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove dead version properties and unnecessary package refs #42109
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Attempt to fix Publish60Hosted_Works test #42061
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update .editorconfig template with new defaults #42059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] update warning message for containers package inclusion #40628
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add source.dot.net stage 1 asset publication #42132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Android workload manifests to SB .NET SDK #42125
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24365.1 #42156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
